department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類:化工類

goal.en: 1. Review the basic law of thermodynamic and the concept of equilibrium. 2. Learn how to calculate various types of phase equilibrium using thermodynamic models. 3. Introduce how microscopic molecular interactions influence macroscopic thermodynamic properties.
goal.ch: 1. 回顧基本的熱力學定律與平衡的概念 2. 學習如何利用熱力學模型計算各類相平衡問題 3. 簡介微觀下的分子間作用力如何影響巨觀下的熱力學性質

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. The Laws of Thermodynamics
3. Fugacity and its evaluation
4. Vapor-liquid equilibria
5. Liquid-liquid equilibria
6. Solubility of gases or solids in liquids
7. Electrolyte solutions
8. Chemical equilibria
9. Intermolecular Forces
content.ch:
1. 導論
2. 熱力學定律
3. 逸度及其計算
4. 液-氣相平衡
5. 液-液相平衡
6. 氣體與固體在溶液中之溶解度
7. 電解質水溶液
8. 化學平衡
9. 分子間作用力簡介

textbook.en: 1. S. I. Sandler, Biochemical, and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc. New York, 2006. 2. J. M. Prausnitz, R.N. Lichtenthaler, E. G. de Azevedo, Molecular Thermodynamics of Fluid-Phase Equilibria, 3rd ed., Prentice-Hall, New York, 1999.
textbook.ch: 1. S. I. Sandler, Biochemical, and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc. New York, 2006. 2. J. M. Prausnitz, R.N. Lichtenthaler, E. G. de Azevedo, Molecular Thermodynamics of Fluid-Phase Equilibria, 3rd ed., Prentice-Hall, New York, 1999.
